title: Healthy Expectations for Busy Seasons
itunes:summary:
When we get angry at our family, there's typically a deeper reason why. It might even be rooted in unrealistic expectations. Erin, Greg and John discuss how to have healthy expectations for busy seasons, and ways to show your spouse grace when he or she gets upset.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Reconnected: Moving From Roommates to Soulmates in Your Marriage" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-08-10?refcd=1137202

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/healthy-expectations-for-busy-seasons/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
